name: Okean Kalxat
description:
Go on a trip on the open sea with your favourite companion : your kite. Figure out how to use the wind to your advantage and beware the multiple islands you might crash into. In short, enjoy the freedom of the wind !     

  • Move your Kite :  arrows    <-   ->
  • Change the boat direction :  Q - D
  • Change your camera angle :   A - E
  • Reset :  R
  • Return to menu :  Echap

Find and get the flag to win the level !

  • Simon "KuroNeko" Feugeas : Lead Programmeur, Babysitter  
  • Liam "SpaceConcombre" Hô : Gamedesigner, Level designer, Programmer, 3D modeler
  • Hugo "Kougo" Thibon : Programmer
  • Anaïs "Satanaïs" Tixier Mahmoudi :  Lead Graphist
  • Clémence "Bl-inky" Ruminy :  Gamedesigner, Ergonomist, Sound designer, Graphist

Many thanks to Horace, Sothar and MiamLesChocapics for this jam !

Thank you for playing !
